data.title: My birthday present!
data.text: We had never stayed at a b & b before. My husband did the research and chose this one for my birthday! We had a great night. Loved the huge tub, soft towels, robes, and oh so comfy bed! Didn't jump I the double shower, but that looked fun! Breakfast was tasty, and owners very kind. Definitely  recommend!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Judy,  It was an absolute pleasure to host your birthday celebration.  We are honored that your husband chose us and thank you for the wonderful review!
Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Four stays. Five Stars.
data.text:
My wife and I live nearby and like to stay here for a night away every now and then. We've stayed in three different rooms and have never been disappointed. 

In room breakfasts are fantastic and each room is romantic. It is located in town, but still has a great feel! 

Martha and Gary are also gracious and excellent hosts. 

Highly recommend!!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Lance, 
Thank you for writing!  Wonderful to open email this beautiful Sunday morning to this lovely review.  We are still having fun after 25 years!  Blessings!
Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Top-notch!
data.text: Me and my wife had such a wonderful time here for my birthday.  We stayed in the Crown Jewel Villa room. It was VERY nice! Comfy bed, TV, sitting/dining area, huge jacuzzi tub, awesome walk-in shower (for two!), balcony with view of OCU campus, and it's own private entrance. The owners were wonderful and accommodating. We came on my birthday and my wife surprised me by paying for the birthday package which included balloons around the room and a delicious birthday cake and birthday wishes. Then we had the awesome breakfast that they are known for: pumpkin pancakes, fruit and cream, omelet bake.... It is also close to plenty of shopping and restaurants. We will definitely be back!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Daniel,  It was an absolute honor to host your birthday celebration!  We have alot of fun set up the birthday party package too.  A room full of balloons to makes even your innkeeper smile. Thank you for writing. 
Martha & Gary
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Poor Customer Service
data.text: The staff is rude and unaccommodating. They are completely inflexible and do not seem to have the guests best interest in mind. We will not be staying here in the future and hope that we have saved some people the trouble of staying here as well.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review.  Yes, I understand we separated on unfriendly terms and I'm very sorry for that.  We do have business policies in place for a reason to protect our business and to guarantee our guest's reservations and plans.  That's why we are so careful to be sure guests have read and understand the policies.  Again thank you for sharing this with future guests.  You have helped us immensely and we wish you the best.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Quiet place to reconnect with your significant other!
data.text: This place is LOVELY. We stayed here for our very first night away from our toddler ever. The Remembrance room (our suite) was perfectly designed to with plush bedding and a spa like atmosphere. Everything was personalized for us from from little themed cards on our towels greeting us to a note telling us of all the amenities. They even had yummy cookies sitting in our room for us when we got there. Also in our room were bath salts and wonderful hand and foot scrub as well as bath towels and a giant (more than big enough for my 6 foot tall husband) jetted tub. The entire inn has this adorable rustic feel to it and it's incredibly quiet! The breakfast was AMAZING we had yummy waffles with syrup, fruit, and a wonderful tomato kische. Also they brought warm towels infused with peppermint to help us wake up. Breakfast was brought to our room promptly at the time requested and set up beautifully including a fancy gold candelabra with lit candles. When we checked out Martha had a little customized gift for us that was very sweet. You can tell that Gary and Martha really love what they do and take every effort to help their guests rekindle the romance. This was the perfect place to get that night away from the kiddo.

data.title: Love Gary & Martha
data.text: Our children gave us a gift certificate to come and relax and we greatly enjoyed our evening here. Gary and Martha, the innkeepers, are extraordinary. They even surprised us with a bottle of sparkling wine. We stayed in the Crown Jewel Villa. It was beautiful with a jetted tub, king sized bed and a double shower. We live in a rural area and came prepared for "city noises" with a sound machine and had no difficulties. The breakfast was AMAZING. It was served with the same sweet spirit we were greeted with when we arrived. The property itself is quite old and is beginning to need some maintenance but our room was clean and comfortable.

data.title: Valentines Romance
data.text:
We had The Remembrance room......very romantic with working fireplace, large jacuzzi tub for two. Cozy dining nook.
Martha and Gary love what they do and we will definitely visit again.
Thank you both for a wonderful Valentines getaway.
Victoria & Steven

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for writing.  Always makes our day to hear from our guests like this.  We look forward to having you visit again soon!  Martha
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Absolutely Wonderful
data.text:
We pick this has our anniversary get away this year. 
The attention to detail was well received and acknowledged. 
The nite in the door welcoming us to our stay. 
The cottage lit up just rough for maximum wow factor from the  time we opened the door   

Thanks for all you did we will be back.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the Review!  We loved having you at Aaron's Gate Country Getaways!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent
data.text: We visited UCO and wanted to try something local. This did not disappoint.  Very good accommodations and attentive service.  Stayed in the Royal Suite. The Inn is centrally located, very near to UCO. Some people may want something quieter and more off the beaten path. But, we considered it a plus. The owners have been there for 25 yrs and show a lot of pride in their labor of love.  Hope others will give this a try as opposed to staying in a hotel chain.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I'm so glad you chose to stay with us!  It's always a pleasure to host friends from around the country.  We loved having you.  Thank you for the review too!  If you are coming are way again, please visit again.  
Warmly,
Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Brought me to tears-amazing
data.text: My husband and I stayed here to celebrate our anniversary. My husband called last minute (literally the day of our stay) and one of the owners answered. He was so kind and only had one room left but booked it for us immediately. We showed up 30 minutes later and the owner was still dashing about getting everything ready for our room. At first I thought, "what could take so much effort"? But, when we got to the room-I saw. We stayed in the Master Suite which is decorated in deep purples, there is a huge tub, a large shower, a kind size bed and SO much character. You walk in and are instantly relaxed. There were personal touches ALL OVER the room welcoming us for our stay. There were signs on the vanity and bed welcoming us by name and on the table and hand written welcome with homemade cookies. They have a great video selection should you decide to watch a movie and the Inn is located within walking distance of many local restaurants. Our room had a seating area outside of the door for enjoying a nice glass of wine. The rooms were very quiet and bed was SOO comfortable. The next morning breakfast was delivered to our room and served by candle light. It was BY FAR the best breakfast we have ever had. Waffles with sweet butter sauce, a quiche, fruit, coffee and juice. Accompanied by the morning paper and a little note hoping we enjoyed our breakfast, again referring to us by name. We loved that we were treated like family and always referred to by name rather than just being another customer. You check out in the gift shop where you can also purchase the wonderful bath salts and lotions found in the room. We absolutely love this bed and breakfast and I can't wait to have another celebration that will allow us to stay again!!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your review.  We do love having you and want YOU to feel special.  I'm glad we could host your special occasion.  See you again soon!
Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: UNBELIEVABLE
data.text: My husband and I stayed here for our 10th anniversary in the Magnolia Suite. It literally could not have been more perfect. Gary and Martha have really thought of everything! It was so romantic and beautiful. They have put your name on things throughout the room to make you feel welcome and special. The big, deep, jetted bathtub is amazing. They even provide bath salts for you. There is a Keurig with both Coffee and Tea selections, microwave, and mini fridge. The bed is so comfortable and romantic with the lighted canopy and sheer curtains surrounding the bed. There is also a flat screen TV with a dvd player. THE BREAKFAST WAS AMAZING!!!!!!! We will definitely be coming back for many anniversaries to come!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your wonderful comments.  It's always a pleasure to host your special occasions.  Your review is an encouragement and blesses us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Romantic, clean, and delicious!
data.text: My husband and I went here for our anniversary. The food was outstanding, the rooms were clean and cozy, the innkeepers were super friendly and I swear they must of been the cooking school!! Everything that we ate was to die for! And They even gave us a little gift whenever we left! We couldn't have asked for a better experience! We will definitely be going back!!!!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review.  It was lovely today to find this in my email.  It's always an encouragement to hear from our guests.  We love to hosting your special getaways.  As always, we especially look forward to your return visit.  Warmly, Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love this place
data.text: My husband and I went here and stayed in the garden room for our anniversary. We were very skeptical because we had never tried a B&B before. We loved every minute and the breakfast was amazing. This B&B also inspired us to try another so we did and the other (Grandison in OKC) completely sucked compared to this one.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I'm so sorry, I am late responding to your review. Thank you so much.  We do love having you and hope to see you again soon.  Warmly, Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful Place to Stay
data.text:
My husband and I have stayed here three times, and I realized I've never come back to review it! The Arcadian Inn is such a special place to stay. The house is gorgeous and comfortable. The innkeepers are so kind and thoughtful. They personalize so many things, and make you feel so welcome.

We've stayed in the Garden Room and the Royal Master. Both rooms are great, and have their own specific good things. The Royal Master has an excellent, large Jacuzzi tub. The Garden Room has a Jacuzzi tub as well, but it's a bit smaller. Both rooms are cozy and well decorated, pretty without being too feminine. The waffle weave robes are pure bliss. They have a large selection of DVDs to choose from, which is a nice touch. The Garden Room has a bit of street noise, as to be expected since it looks out over University Drive. The Royal Master has a private entrance and is on the back of the house so you feel more secluded.

Then there's the breakfast. Oh my, the breakfast. It never fails to impress us. You arrange a time for breakfast to be delivered to your room, which I really appreciate (instead of having to meet in a dining room at a certain window of time). The food is so amazing, each time. There's usually something sweet, such as waffles or pancakes with their yummy vanilla butter syrup. There's also something more savory, such as a breakfast casserole, as well as fresh fruit with yogurt. They bring you orange juice in champagne glasses with a sugared rim, and light a silver candleabra for your table. The whole thing is beautifully laid out.

We recommend the Arcadian Inn to everyone we know, and definitely plan to stay there again. We'd like to stay in each room at least once!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow! Lori!  You are good for an innkeeper's soul today!  Thank you for taking the time to review and for noticing that we really do care about your visit.  As always, it 's our pleasure and honor to host your getaways!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Outstanding!
data.text: Really it's beyond me how anyone could rate this Bed and Breakfast anything but excellent and 5 stars. I took my wife here for our 28th anniversary. I had planned to take her to the Edmond Jazz Lab that night but after checking in we never left the room for two days. The innkeepers obviously love what they do and it shows. My wife was floored by the personal touches and attention to detail through the stay. We had food catered in by the B&B from Lottinville's which was outstanding but the real stunning food experience is the breakfast. catered personally by the innkeepers and looking like it came off the front cover of a Chef's Magazine. They bring it to you with a candelabra and you have breakfast by candlelight, hot peppermint towels for your face, fresh fruit, pumpkin pancakes with fresh diced apples and brown sugar, OJ in a champagne glass with a red sugar rim and a "country eggroll" creation that is delicious and all of it visually stunning. When we checked in we were offered a huge selection of DVD's from a barrister's cabinet to watch in our room with the flat panel TV and Bose-like surround sound system. We had a huge old fashioned style whirlpool bath which was relaxing as can be. We went 25 minutes from our home and felt like we had traveled to another country for two days. If you want a romantic and relaxing experience with outstanding hospitality you can't go wrong here.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and for sharing your experience!  It was an absolute joy to host your 28th anniversary!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful B&B!
data.text: My husband and I stayed for our anniversary and we absolutely loved everything about our stay. This B&B is absolutely top shelf when it comes to atmosphere & service. The Hall's have created the ultimate romantic experience.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you!  It is definitely our desire to make your evening a special occasion for the two of you!  That's what we are all about and your review is so appreciated.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Absolutly Perfect couples getaway!!
data.text: I can not rave enough about this place!!  My husband and I stayed in the Captains Quarters room for our anniversary and it was the most romantic place we have ever been.  The huge jacuzzi tub fit us both very comfortably and my hubby is not a small man.  Start the water well before you want to get it because it takes a while to fill up that huge tub.  The bathroom had a his/hers dual head shower.  Super romanic inroom fireplace with a seating area where our breakfast was served to our room every morning.  Large comfortable robes are in your room to use.  They left no detail undone, and it was exceptionaly clean.  Our trip was personalized from our name on the welcome guest list to the cards and information sheet in our room.  The staff is so sweet and brought our wine glasses, ice, etc. to our room for us.  You MUST stay here at least once.  It was the perfect place to rekindle the romance that 13 years of marriage and 2 kids can sometimes make you forget!  LOVED IT!!

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wow!  Thanks for writing your review.  We are glad you are still enjoying the memories too!  See you for the 14th Anniversary?  Make it an annual tradition.  We are still dreaming up great ways to make your occasions very special.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing
data.text: We loved our stay it was amazing, relaxing and a perfect getaway. If you need to get away from the grind of life come to this place relaxing jet tub with a king size bed and mounds of pillows. Need a little romance they have that too very intimate and private.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for reviewing.   It is our goal to be all of the above and more for you.  Your review encourages us.  Thanks, again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The only good thing was the breakfast.
data.text: Check in took forever.  We waited and waited and waited.  Finally called them and they came to show us in.  The room was beautiful!  Not enough hot water for the two person tub, very squeaky bed.  We could hear the people in the room next to us.  It was very uncomfortable.  We will mot return.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,  First, Thank you for your review.  We care very much about your experience.  Our email address is innkeeper@arcadianinn.com and we would love to know when and what room you stayed in as we aren't accustom to these comments and need to know when and where this happened. 
 For those reading this review, We would rather know that evening so that if something was wrong with hot water or doorbell or overly noisy neighbors, we might have been able to make it right for you immediately.  
We strive to make sure the beds are comfortable, luxurious, and quiet.  So we will go through the house to see what room might have been squeaky.  
As we've said before, a complaint is a gift and we thank this reviewer for bringing this to our attention and strive to make everyone's stay wonderful.  
Sincerely,
Your Innkeepers.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great personalized experience
data.text: The stay at Arcadian Inn is personalized from start to finish.  From walking up to see your first names printed on the welcome sign to the breakfast delivered and set up for you in your room at the time you as for it to arrive, Gary and Martha seem to go out of their way to make you feel special and that yours is the only stay that matters.  There are many great details that make this a great experience.  The couples massage in the room was more than worth the money.  The whirlpool tub is enormous and great for relaxing.  The bed and sheets are very comfortable and allow a good night's sleep.  There is a bathrobe for each of you that is also very comfortable and provides an added feeling of luxury to this unique stay.  The breakfast is wonderful, and we appreciated the convenience of the mini-fridge and 1-cup coffee maker in the room.  Every part of the stay seems to be designed to make romance and relaxation come easy.  We would definitely stay here again.

owner_response.author: Badammutterfly, Owner at Arcadian Inn Bed and Breakfast, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
"Gary and Martha seem to go out of their way to make you feel special and that yours is the only stay that matters"    
Derek and your lovely wife, I'm late responding, but thank you for the review.  Using a person's name touches the heart and though sometimes we can't recall things, we were looking for a way to touch you.  Your names.   I didn't mention your wife's name in this public setting but we were very happy to have you stay with us.  And look forward to your return visit.  

Warmly,
Martha, Your Innkeeper
owner_response.title: Owner Response
